instruction: Analyze how a character changes in the course of the story.
input: A young man struggles to find his place between his traditional father and modern friends.
output: The young man starts out struggling to reconcile his father's traditional values with his modern friends’ beliefs. He gradually learns to appreciate the shared values of both sides, forming a stronger bond with his father and gaining a better understanding of his modern friends. This newfound appreciation of the two perspectives leads to newfound strength and courage in the young man, enabling him to make decisions for himself and stand firm against both sides.
